continuum_deployer.solving package¶

Submodules¶

continuum_deployer.solving.greedy module¶

class continuum_deployer.solving.greedy.Greedy(deployment_entities: continuum_deployer.resources.deployment.DeploymentEntity, resources: continuum_deployer.resources.resources.Resources)¶

Bases: continuum_deployer.solving.solver.Solver

static deploy_iterate(entity, resources)¶

Helper that traverses a list of resources and tries to place the given deploment entity on one of the resources.

Parameters

  • entity (continuum_deployer.resources.deployment.DeploymentEntity) – deployment entity that should be placed

  • resources (list) – list of resource entities that are valid targets

Returns

boolean flag representing the success of the placement attempt

Return type

bool

do_matching(deployment_entities, resources)¶

Does actual deployment to resource matching

greedy_attr(entities, resources, attr)¶
match()¶

Main matcher method that invokes some preflight checks and starts the label based grouped matching

static sort_by_attr(items, attr)¶

Helper function that sorts list of items based on configurable attribute

Parameters

  • items (list) – items to sort

  • attr (str) – name of the attribute the sorting should be carried out with

Returns

list of sorted items

Return type

list

continuum_deployer.solving.sat module¶

class continuum_deployer.solving.sat.SAT(deployment_entities: continuum_deployer.resources.deployment.DeploymentEntity, resources: continuum_deployer.resources.resources.Resources)¶

Bases: continuum_deployer.solving.solver.Solver

CPU_SCALE_FACTOR = 1000.0¶
do_matching(deployment_entities, resources)¶

Actual solver implementation. Uses constraint programming to find an optimal solution for the deployment placing task.

Parameters

  • deployment_entities (list) – list of continuum_deployer.resources.deployment.DeploymentEntity objects to place

  • resources (list) – list of continuum_deployer.resources.resource_entity.ResourceEntity object to fill with deployments

static get_deployment_names(deployments)¶
match()¶

Main matcher method that invokes some preflight checks and starts the label based grouped matching

static scale_cpu_values(entities, idle=False)¶

Helper function that scales cpu values to integers. Necessary for the digestion trough the CP-SAT solver.

Parameters

  • entities (list) – list of entities with cpu values that should be scaled

  • idle (bool, optional) – flag to decided if entities idle cpu should be scaled, defaults to False

Returns

list of scaled cpu values

Return type

list

continuum_deployer.solving.solver module¶

Bases: yapsy.IPlugin.IPlugin

UNLABELED_TOKEN = 'unlabeled'¶
check_upper_bound(entities, resources)¶

Helper that iterates all deployment and resources entities to check if a certain deployment exceeds the largest available resource.

Parameters

  • entities (list) – list of deployment entities

  • resources (list) – list of resource entities

Raises

SolverError – raised if largest deployment exceeds available resources

group(entities)¶

Helper function that creates a dict datastructure containing groups of elements that have the same labels assigned

Parameters

entities (list) – list of items to group

Returns

grouped dict datastructure, keys are based on label hashes

Return type

dict

match()¶

Main matcher method that invokes some preflight checks and starts the label based grouped matching

match_labeled()¶

Handles group based label matching. Functions calls actual solver implementation do_matching() multiple times and takes care of the deployment constrains enforced by the assigned labels.

print_resources()¶
reset_matching()¶

Resets current matching state of solver
